context.title: Text transformation
context.description:
Before encrypting the text, the following transformation can be applied to the text:
Upper-/lowercase transformation:Transforms the text into upper or lower case.
Replacement of umlauts: Transforms the umlauts ä, ö, ü and ß plus uppercase versions (common in the German language), into ae, oe, ue and ss.
Delete blanks and line breaks: Removes all blanks and line breaks from the text.
Filter characters by an alphabet: Removes all characters from the text that are not contained in the selected alphabet.
